biotools.summary: zPicture (pairwise alignment) and multi-zPicture (multiple alignment) are web-based sequence alignment tools based on the blastz alignment program. Alignments from zPicture can be automatically submitted to rVista.

bioschemas.name: zPicture and multi-zPicture
bioschemas.summary: zPicture (pairwise alignment) and multi-zPicture (multiple alignment) are web-based sequence alignment tools based on the blastz alignment program. Alignments from zPicture can be automatically submitted to rVista.
